channel.title: How do I add:Attacking npc's gives exp?
channel.description: Ok, I'm using a phonescape source and I've noticed that attacking an npc doesn't give you any exerience. I'm wondering how I can do this. Also, how can I make it so that damage you deal is based of certain things, npc damage is based off certain things, etc.

item.title: How do I add:Attacking npc's gives exp?
item.dc:creator: @elite_azn elite azn
item.description:
@elite_azn wrote:

ok ty, and what about the damage you deal and get hit for depending on npcs lvls and your lvls? I think P16 Blitz has it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add:Attacking npc's gives exp?

Try something to do with copying the ‘training on dummies’ void/boolean/ints what ever and editing the ID’s and code and such.
